title: Iron Python keep selection
question: I can select edges of a brep within an ironpython script. I can see the highlighted selection in Rhino, if I execute time.sleep(5). After the script is finished, the selection dissapears. How can I keep the selection within Rhino after code completion?

code_blocks.code:
import scriptcontext
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

brep_id = rs.GetObject("select a poly surface", rs.filter.polysurface)
brep = rs.coercebrep(brep_id)
rhino_object = rs.coercerhinoobject(brep_id)
scriptcontext.doc.Objects.UnselectAll()

for edge in brep.Edges:
    rhino_object.SelectSubObject(edge.ComponentIndex(),True, True)
